name: tesseract-node-bindings

scripts.coverage:run: npm run build-debug && node --nouse_idle_notification --expose-gc ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover --report lcovonly -- test/unit.js
scripts.coverage:buildLcov: npm run coverage:run && lcov --capture --base-directory build/ --directory . --output-file coverage/addon.info
scripts.coverage:extract: npm run coverage:buildLcov && lcov --extract coverage/addon.info '*src/*' --output-file coverage/bindings.info
scripts.coverage:merge: npm run coverage:extract && lcov --test-name tesseract-node-bindings --add-tracefile coverage/lcov.info --add-tracefile coverage/bindings.info --output-file coverage/tesseract-node-bindings.info
scripts.coverage:html: npm run coverage:merge && genhtml --output-directory coverage coverage/tesseract-node-bindings.info
